mapper.select: select po.id, pot.id as type_id, pot."name" as "type", poo.id as object_id, poo."name" as "object", por.id as result_id, por.value as result_value, por.description as result_description from tree_data.phenology p, tree_data.phenology_observation po, tree_data.phenology_observation_type pot, tree_data.phenology_observation_object poo, tree_data.phenology_observation_result por where p.id = #{id} and p.id = po.phenology_id and po.observation_object_id = poo.id and po.observation_result_id = por.id and poo.type_id = por.type_id and poo.type_id = pot.id

mapper.select: select t.id as type_id, t."name" as "type", o.id as object_id, o."name" as "object", r.id as result_id, r.value as result_value, r.description as result_description from tree_data.phenology_observation_type t, tree_data.phenology_observation_object o, tree_data.phenology_observation_result r, tree_data.phenology_observation_type_species ts where t.id = o.type_id and t.id = r.type_id and t.id = ts.type_id and ts.species_id = #{treeSpeciesId} order by t.id, o.id, r.id
